title: Bits vs Pes
content: Obv ik bits is better but my bits went hell and now my father will think like I didnâ€™t try hard enough or anything and idk where he heard ki Pes dosent have good placements and itâ€™s a shit college so now I need points to for Pes to convince him itâ€™s good and Iâ€™ll get a good placement, for example I have one point that Pes highest package 2023 was 65lpa and bits was 60lpa

comments.body:
If you replace the"b" in bits with a "t", you get tits

If you replace the "p" with a "b" and add a "t" at the end, you get "best"

Coincidence!!?? I think not!!!

"PES UNIVERSITY" has 14 characters (including whitespace)

14 is a multiple of 7. 

Thala for a reason.
Only point in where pes is better than bits is that its located in bangalore , but bits hyd kinda negates that point
Rowlet-owl Anna = 14 characters multiple of 7 thala for a reason
Haan toh bhai I agree bits better hai but meri vaat lagni hai aaj shaam ko
Bhai pes ke advantages hai but you can't really expect anything better than bits. NitK is good but there's nothing better in it when compared to iitB

Ik bhai ik I just want points to defend Pes and not like this is my only option merko vellore aur bms wagera mil jayega nit Srinagar wagera bhi mil rha hai but unko kaise samjhaun ki meri choice hai majburi nhi, abh jaise I was looking at IIT jammu placement stats and cse ke liye itâ€™s exactly like Pes so woh sab bolke dekhenge

how about comparing median packages instead of highest ones.   
check out the pinned post abt pesus pros and cons by rowlet-owl . ull get some ideas
